description: The jungle can be a surprising place. You never know what might be lurking behind the next bush. Will it be a friendly monkey or a hungry lion? Dot thinks the best way to find out is to start whacking some bushes!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically say "I'm gonna look over there" then automatically turn on green lights.
After turning on green lights, make Dot play an FX sound when Dot feels a slide left or a slide right.

hints.description: Choose an FX sound for Dot to play. Link the Green light to the sound using Slide Left and Slide Right cues.

puzzles.description: After the FX sound, make Dot randomly choose to play the lion sound or turn on green lights.
puzzles.introduction: When searching in the jungle, you never know what you will find.  Always be on the look out for itchy plants or hungry animals!

hints.description: Link the states with Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: After the lion sound, make Dot automatically turn on red lights then automatically say "Hide me!"

hints.description: Drag out a Red light and a Cautious sound. Set the sound to "Hide me!" Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After saying "Hide me!", make Dot wait for 3.0 s then play the Dizzy #1 sound. After the Dizzy #1 sound, make Dot say "I'm gonna look over there" when the top button is pressed.

hints.description: Link the "Hide me!" sound to the Dizzy #1 sound using a Wait For cue set to 3.0 s. Link the Dizzy #1 sound to the "I'm gonna look over there" sound using a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Hide me!", make Dot turn the lights off when tilted upside down. Then make Dot wait for 3.0 s and say "I'm gonna look over there".

hints.description: Link the "Hide me!" sound to the Lights Off state using an Upside Down cue. Link the light to the "I'm gonna look over there" sound using a Wait For cue set to 3.0 s.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot whack some bushes and explore the jungle. When the lion roars, help Dot hide three times.
puzzles.introduction: Time to whack some bushes and explore the jungle!
